Text:
Crystal KalOnline specifications
- 80x exp rate
- 40x egg rate
- custom droprate (higher rates) - nearly international loot tables
- max grade: g70 armor and g75 weapons
- honor system including skillbooks, honor weapons, accessorys
- pvp tournament (1on1)
- bead of fire
- instance system (normal, hard)
- 3. job item (more dmg and other stats)
- recall scroll (invidual, party, guild)
- monster summoning scroll
- lottery system
- international areas
- new monster/area which you have never seen before
- nearly international monster spawns (emok, foe, top)
- support ticket system via homepage
- protected by KOEM v2
